name: Dysfunctional Systems: Orientation
description: Dysfunctional Systems: Orientation is a kinetic novel and a prequel to Dysfunctional Systems: Learning to Manage Chaos. It uses text, sound, and illustrations to tell a story and follows Winter Harrison during her first week at mediator school.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual-Core Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card Storage: 600 MB available space
